    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static int open(java.lang.String deviceName)
        Open the serial port by the specified device name.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - in WizarPOS1, deviceName is DB9, in WizarHANDQ1, deviceName is WIZARHANDQ1.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • close

        public static int close()
        Close the serial port opened before.
        Returns:
        value >= 0, success in starting the process; value < 0, error code

      • read

        public static int read(byte[] pDataBuffer,
       int nExpectedDataLength,
       int nTimeout_MS)
        Get information from the serial port.
        Parameters:
        pDataBuffer - Data buffer
        nExpectedDataLength - Data length to read
        nTimeout_MS - Time in milliseconds. <0: read until got data.
        Returns:
        value >0, data length; value < 0, error code

      • write

        public static int write(byte[] pDataBuffer,
        int offset,
        int nDataLength)
        Send information from the serial port.
        Parameters:
        pDataBuffer - Data buffer
        offset - offset of the data buffer
        nDataLength - data length of write
        Returns:
        value >=0, write data length; value < 0, error code

      • setBaudrate

        public static int setBaudrate(int nBaudrate)
        Set the baud rate of the serial port so that this device can read and write in the same baud rate.
        Parameters:
        nBaudrate - baud rate
        Returns:
        value >=0, write data length; value < 0, error code

      • flushIO

        public static int flushIO()
        Flush the IO buffer of the serial port.
        Returns:
        value >=0, success; value < 0, error code

      • isOpened

        public static boolean isOpened()
        Recognize if the serial port is open.
        Returns:
        true is opened
